review_topic: San Diego, California Tacos El Gordo is real good
review_details: Five stars for the Adobada tacos! The ordering process is confusing and hilariously inefficient, especially for a non-Spanish speaker. I had a sweet guy offer to be my translator and guide me through the process. Adobada is basically al pastor with a spicy sauce, he said. The guy working there said they're the same thing. You just get the taco with everything (including sauce), or you do not. I was just glad to get my tacos! We only tried the carne asada and adobada meat. I liked both but would get the fries with the adobada meat next time. And the fries take forever. A delicious and fun experience, especially if you don't have time to cross the border!
stay away from it! thats the most dangerious zone in LA downtown

review_topic: go check out US Space & Rocket Center
review_details: Located in the city of Huntsville in Northern Alabama, the US Space and Rocket Center is a mecca of all things space and is one of the most visited attractions in Alabama. Some of the key highlights are the shuttle experience or flight simulator, both of which make it feel like you are experiencing space exploration or ground control in real life.

As Alaska's largest city, Anchorage is an absolute must on any Alaskan bucket list. It is a sprawling city with quiet, serene corners and a steady thrum of city life at its core. Take a hike in the stunning Chugach State Park or visit one of the numerous five star resorts in the area for a vacation you will never forget.

review_topic: Phoenix Zoo, a must go place
review_details: If you are looking for some of the best places to go in Phoenix, you cannot go wrong with the popular Phoenix Zoo.The zoo boasts several exhibits, such as the African savanna, Asian forest, and South American rainforest, allowing visitors to get up close with exotic animals. All these features make the Phoenix Zoo a must-visit attraction in Phoenix.
Las Vegas is a great time other than blowing all of my money.
Colorado is full of natural beauty and the Rocky Mountains are right at the forefront. I can't wait to go back.
It was dirty but the pizza was good.
I unfortunately didn't see a big apple.
They were right. Everything is bigger in Texas.
The cheese was frozen solid so I couldn't even eat it. The people were nice though.
I could not get over how pretty the state of Washington was. Highly recommended that people come here.
I could not get over how pretty the state of Washington was. Highly recommended that people come here.
Enjoyed the picturesque mountains and the clean, friendly city vibe. The winter skiing is top-notch!
Nashville was bustling with live music everywhere you turn. Great food and people. A bit crowded in some places but overall a great experience.
Had my first deep dish pizza in Chicago. It's a whole different world of pizza. Delicious!
The state is just too hot in summer, would recommend visiting in the winter months instead.
Miami's nightlife is vibrant and diverse. There are options for everyone and you can find something fun to do any night of the week.
The traffic is unbearable. Spent most of my time stuck in my car. Need a better public transport system.
The nature in Oregon is breathtaking. Loved hiking in the forests and the coast is simply stunning.
It was really cool to see places like the Paul Revere House and the Boston Tea Party Ships. The Freedom Trail was a fun way to spend the day.
The live jazz music in New Orleans is unparalleled. Don't forget to try the beignets!
The beaches in Hawaii are beautiful. The water is clear and the sand is soft. Great place for a vacation.
The BBQ in Kansas City is delicious. Tried several BBQ joints and all were fantastic.
While there's a lot of entertainment, it was too crowded and noisy for my taste.
Yellowstone National Park is a treasure. The geysers, wildlife, and scenery were all unforgettable. Just brace yourself for lots of driving within the park.
Oregon's Crater Lake is one of the most beautiful sights I've ever seen. It's absolutely serene and breathtaking.
The Liberty Bell and the surrounding historical district are a must-see when in Pennsylvania. Very informative and interesting!
Miami has a very active nightlife. There's always something to do, from clubs to late-night beach parties.
The music scene in Nashville is impressive, especially if you're a fan of country. The Grand Ole Opry is a must-visit.
The Great Smoky Mountains National Park is a beautiful place for hiking and camping. A nature lover's paradise!
